Tropical_Sweet_Fruits.description: Ultra-sweet, creamy, or floral fruits from tropical regions.
Tropical_Sweet_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup coconut milk, 1 frozen banana, 1 tsp honey, ice.

Tart_Berries.description: Small, acidic berries packed with antioxidants.
Tart_Berries.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup Greek yogurt, 1 tbsp maple syrup, ½ cup almond milk.

Citrus_Zesty_Fruits.description: High in vitamin C, with tangy or floral acidity.
Citrus_Zesty_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 peeled {{fruit}}, ½ cup pineapple, ½ cup coconut water, mint.

Stone_Fruits.description: Fleshy with a single pit, juicy and fragrant.
Stone_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 2 pitted {{fruit}}, ½ cup vanilla yogurt, ¼ tsp cardamom.

Melons.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ lime juice, ½ cup mint tea, ice.

Creamy_Fatty_Fruits.description: Rich in healthy fats, smooth texture.
Creamy_Fatty_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 {{fruit}}, 1 banana, 1 handful spinach, 1 cup oat milk.

Exotic_Superfruits.description: Rare, nutrient-dense fruits with bold flavors.
Exotic_Superfruits.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}}, 1 banana, 1 tsp spirulina, 1 cup almond milk.

Figs_And_Multi_Seed_Fruits.description: Gel-filled with tiny seeds, honey-like sweetness.
Figs_And_Multi_Seed_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 3 {{fruit}}, ½ cup cashew milk, 1 date, cinnamon.

Tropical_Tart_Fruits.description: Tangy-sweet tropical fruits, often high in vitamin C.
Tropical_Tart_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ orange juice, 1 tsp ginger, ice.

Pomes.description: Crisp flesh surrounding a central seed core.
Pomes.smoothie_recipe: 1 {{fruit}}, ½ tsp cinnamon, ½ cup carrot juice, ice.

Nuts_And_Seed_Pods.description: Botanically fruits but used as nuts/seeds.
Nuts_And_Seed_Pods.smoothie_recipe: ¼ cup {{fruit}} butter, 1 banana, 1 cup hemp milk.

Vegetable_Fruits.description: Botanically fruits but typically used as vegetables.
Vegetable_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}}, 1 cucumber, 1 celery stalk, lemon juice.

Dark_Berries.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup beet juice, 1 tbsp cacao.

Floral_Fragrant_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup jasmine tea, 1 tsp rosewater.

Giant_Tropical_Fruits.description: Massive, pungent, or fibrous tropical fruits.
Giant_Tropical_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}}, 1 cup mango, ½ cup coconut water.

Hard_Shelled_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}} flesh, 1 cup pineapple juice, ice.

Cactus_Fruits.description: Bright, mildly sweet, from desert plants.
Cactus_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 peeled {{fruit}}, ½ cup orange juice, lime.

Wine_Fermentation_Fruits.description: Often used in wines or fermented drinks.
Wine_Fermentation_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup pomegranate juice, 1 tsp chia.

Medicinal_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}}, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 cup herbal tea.

Mock_Berries.description: Resemble berries but with milder flavor.
Mock_Berries.smoothie_recipe: 1 cup {{fruit}}, ½ banana, ½ cup oat milk.

Toxic_Fruits.smoothie_recipe: NOT RECOMMENDED - Seeds contain lethal toxins.

Unique_Varieties.description: Distinct fruits that defy easy categorization.
Unique_Varieties.smoothie_recipe: ½ cup {{fruit}}, ½ cup mixed berries, 1 cup coconut water.
